caption.p: Survival of C. quitensis grown in three different soil types: non-sterilized native soil (NS, grey circles), sterilized native soil (S-NS, white circles), and sterilized native soil, re-inoculated with fungal endophytes (RI-SNS, black circles) under current (A) and simulated climatic change scenarios (B). Circles are means (± SE). Different letters indicate significant differences (Cox-Mantel tests, α = 0.05).
